name: Secret Relationship
nutshell: It only takes a split second to fall in love with someone you used to hate! The start of an office romance that makes one’s heart pound?!

name: Field no Hanako-san
nutshell: 二ッ森高校サッカー部4軍の出玖森悠太（でくもり・ゆうた／通称デク）のコーチは、元なでしこJ（ジャパン）の美少女で幽体離脱中の花子（はなこ）さん！　デクは花子さんと共に、部員61名が1軍入りをかけて争う下剋上バトル“格付け戦（コパ・レベリオン）”に挑むが!?　取り憑かれて上手くなる!?　新感覚青春サッカーストーリー！

name: Itai Ero (Anthology)
nutshell:
"Zangai wa Asatte no Hou". by Emao
"Zutto Zutsuu" by Moriyo

I fell in love with Miya-chan. We started going out. Because I love him, I decided to have sex with him

name: Mr Ghost and the Latchkey Kid
Ma O Eru!
nutshell: Mao, a timid OL, gets crashed by a bicycle and switches bodies with a demon lord from another world.

name: Taiyou no Yuki
nutshell: A mysterious boy Snow helps a surly chimney sweep Rose integrate into society.

name: CAT TANGO
tags: Action,Romance,Comedy,Crime,User Created,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell: A fan series inspired by Jojo's Bizarre Adventure.

name: Sensuishi to Kurage
nutshell: In one particular town in France, a waiter who feels like he’s stuck at the bottom of the sea meets a free-spirited pâtissier. Across the world, on a frozen tundra, a boy searching for his father meets a scientist and a man with the look of a snowy owl.

name: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
nutshell:
The manga of the popular Light Novel series of the same name
Sisti attends a magical academy to hone her skills in the magical arts, and hopes to solve the mystery of the enigmatic Sky Castle. After the retirement of her favorite teacher, the replacement, Glen, turns out to be a tardy, lazy, seemingly incompetent bastard of an instructor. How was it that Glen was hand-picked by the best magician in the academy!?

name: Saru
nutshell: Published in Muae 2: Collapsing New Buildings

name: Yamcha’s Secret Weapon
nutshell: Comedic Dragon Ball doujinshii focused on a gender-bending Yamcha.

name: While We Broke Up
nutshell: Just as Ira started to live independently, her guy friends started to appear in front of her as men!

name: Gyon-Woo & Jik-Nyu
nutshell:
This story, which has been passed down for a long time, is a story from heaven. A long, long time ago, there were six rulers in Heaven. Each ruler had their own role to perform for the harmony of the world.
The Ruler of Darkness had the power to draw anything and erase anything. The Ruler of Light knitted light to shine on the Earth. The Ruler of Flames danced to create eternal flames. The Ruler of Water brewed alchohol and showered water on the Earth. The Ruler of the Earth plowed the fields to enrich everything. The Ruler of the Wind played the flute to the generate winds.
Each of the rulers had supreme power, yet they could not do everything themselves. Therefore each of the rulers had many spirits as servants. Amongst these servants, those with superior talents became the beloved sons & daughters of the rulers. This story is about the son of the Ruler of the Wind, GYON-WOO. And the daughter of the Ruler of Light, JIK-NYU.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist - You see, actually I'm... (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Little what-if possibility set up in between's FMA's final chapter's last two pages.
Spoilers, obviously.

name: How to Train Your Childhood Playmate - Naughty Share House Life
nutshell: “If you develop your body like this, you will be the perfect bride for your husband...” he says as he plucks her nipple.  Maju, who became a university student must live with her butler, Takakura and be trained by him in marital duties.  She is delighted to live with him but then her childhood friend Tohru comes to live with them too?!  When she is taught how to make the bed she is also taught what to do IN the bed.   She doesn't get to refuse As Takakura smiles and touches her secret places... and Toru too?

name: Chikyuu Misaki
nutshell: Schoolgirl Makishima Misaki's life is about to get a lot more complicated in this first volume of an exciting new title! She has inherited the house that belonged to her maternal grandfather, in a small, quiet, snowy town that boasts its own local legend, the Hohopo. Moving into the house with her klutzy widower father, she soon makes new friends  including one very unusual friend: the Hohopo itself, a shape-shifting creature who looks like a small Loch Ness Monsterwhen he's not masquerading as the boy next door!

name: Omachi Shitemasu Shitamachi Wagashi Kurimarudou
nutshell: A slightly sweet humanity story drawn in Shimomachi Asakusa. A Japanese sweet craftsman, Kurita, and a “Japanese sweet princess” will connect the thoughts of people around Japanese sweets.

name: Soutennenshoku Otomegumi
nutshell:
Ichinose Akane, a second year in high school, is going to a new school, but once she gets there, she got herself lost. But Ninomiya Aoi, a nice girl who looks like a pretty boy, and Sanjou Midori, a beautiful girl who likes to play pranks, helps Akane. The three realize they're all in the same class, and becomes close friends. Now what kind of adventures will they have?
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
Vol. 1
Vol. 2

name: Black Butler Anthology Comic
nutshell: A collection of Kuroshitsuji one-shots chapters by various manga artists.

name: Mother
nutshell: In this family, the Mother does not show their affection to their children. Mother always keeps her love deep inside and only showing her cold face. I have never even saw her smile. Not even once. But after she passed away, I finally understand something…

name: Sand Tiara
nutshell:
Sand Tiara (砂の王冠, Suna no Tiara)
On their way to Eden, princess Tiara and her subjects are attacked, and only the princess survives. Follow her in her quest for revenge.


Hatsuki Triangle
Hodaka Hatsuki takes on the personality and abilities of her old boyfriend everytime she touches a practice sword for the Kendo club. Kunie Kenshi is determined to make her normal once again.


700 Nichi no Blue
Oikawa Masumi tells about her work on a painting titled "Blue Magician" and the man who helped her.

name: Gatabutata
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Just when Chu Hyejin, a freshman in college, is about to start her independent college life, she encounters a crisis. Her first love, Cha Haejun lives right next to her?! And on top of that, she is the one who dumped him when they dated in middle-school!
A 15-year old's clumsy and awkward first love soon came to an end but will things be different this time when they're 20?
(Note: Gatabutata is a Korean saying that means "Get to the point instead of beating around the bush".)



Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Japanese Translation

name: Shinobi no Onna
nutshell:
Another collection of short stories by Kayono involving strange worlds.


Secretly a Woman (Shinobi no Onna) -
By day she's an ambiguous high school girl, but by night…she transforms into a super-hot male host (gigolo)! Yes, Yuka is "Secretly a Woman," but then a woman named Renka comes to the host club and steals both her body and her heart…!?


Butterfly Night -
From Kayono's "Arabian Nights" series. Princess Sheherazade is sent to marry a vile sultan in order to keep him from conquering her father's kingdom, but she's kidnapped en route by the masked Devil Mariam, who will do what it takes to exact revenge against the sultan – including stealing the virginity of the sultan's pretty bride-to-be…! Published in Chokotto Abunai Koimonogatari.


Lovers in the Tower that Touches Heaven -
Ruby, Baghdad's top dancer, is waiting for Jank to return home. When he does, he tells her that he only escaped death by promising Garuda, a carnivorous devil living in the desert, that he could have Ruby for one week. What will happen to Ruby?!

name: Fate/Grand Order Cries of The Avenger  in the Prison Tower
nutshell: Мастер, находившийся пару мгновений назад в Халдее, обнаруживает себя попавшим в тюрьму, кишащую множеством монстров и злых тварей, одна из которых нападает на него. Однако на помощь ему приходит таинственный Слуга класса Авенджер. Тем временем в Халдее выясняется, что душа Мастера оказалась отделенной от тела и запертой в некоем месте, название которому — Замок Иф. Сможет ли Мастер найти дорогу обратно?

name: Jiken wa Skirt no Naka de
nutshell: Yunatsu Sakahara can hear a camera 'shutter' sound when someone stares persistently at another person and her mind is set: "I want that sound for me! I want more attention!" Yuka's forbidden way to achieve this special attention is to reveal what is… "under her skirt"! One day though her attention craving secret accidentally becomes known to her classmate, Hotoho Tamioka and her life is never gonna be the same…

name: Hitomazu wa Horyuu
nutshell: Yuki likes his dorm roommate, Kanome. But Kanome already has someone he likes. One day, Yuki learns that Kanome's love is unrequited, and in order to criticize him for giving up without saying anything, Yuki ends up confessing to him. Full of self-hatred, Yuki runs away from his dorm room and moves from room to room with his friends, but...?

name: A Spoonful Of Your Love
nutshell:
A secret office romance between the son of the CEO of a huge conglomerate and his newbie secretary slash perpetual liar!
Yeonju gave up her career in order to chase after love, but only found herself left with scars and pain…
After getting a position at a huge company as a secretary, she finds herself face-to-face with her new boss, Jaehyun, who also happens to be a former classmate of Yeonju’s! Jaehyun’s serious good looks and short temper earned him the nickname among his employees, “the S.H.B.”, or the “super, handsome bastard”.
After a series of humiliating situations, Jaehyun admits that he no longer just wants to be friends, and would rather date. Yeonju, who had her mind set on never dating ever again, finds herself interested despite how hard she tries not to fall for him!
